means: 留存，（萤光屏上余辉的）保留时间

word_mean: 生态系统在一定边界范围内, 保持恒定或维持某一特定状态的持续时间。

sentence.Network_en: Sandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentence.Network_cn: 桑德拉决心成为医生，她的坚持取得了成功。

sentence.Network_en: Chandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱德拉决心做一名医生，她的坚持不懈得到了回报。

sentence.Network_en: Skill comes only with practice, patience and persistence.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有不断练习，有耐心有毅力，才能学会一门技艺。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French persistance, from the verb persister; influenced in spelling by Latin persistent- 'continuing steadfastly'

entry.def: If you have persistence, you continue to do something even though it is difficult or other people are against it.

example.ex: Skill comes only with practice, patience and persistence...
example.tran: 只有不断练习，有耐心有毅力，才能学会一门技艺。

example.ex: Chandra was determined to become a doctor and her persistence paid off.
example.tran: 钱德拉决心做一名医生，她的坚持不懈得到了回报。

entry.tran: （尤指不好事物的）持续存在，延续
entry.def: The persistence of something, especially something bad, is the fact of its continuing to exist for a long time.

example.ex: ...an expression of concern at the persistence of inflation and high interest rates.
example.tran: 对持续通货膨胀和高利率表现出的关注

means.word_mean: 1. the property of a continuous and connected period of time
3. the act of persisting or persevering; continuing or repeating behavior;

sentences.sentence: "his perseveration continued to the point where it was no longer appropriate"

auth_sentence.content: Don't sacrifice persistence for the sake of readability.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't sacrifice persistence for the sake of readability.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't sacrifice persistence for the sake of readability.

auth_sentence.content: By persistence and agreeing to do anything at any time.
auth_sentence.res_content: By persistence and agreeing to do anything at any time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By persistence and agreeing to do anything at any time.

auth_sentence.content: Initiative, creativity, drive and persistence are still key.
auth_sentence.res_content: Initiative, creativity, drive and persistence are still key.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Initiative, creativity, drive and persistence are still key.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

means.word_mean: 坚持不懈;执意;执着,持续;留存

sentences.en: The persistence of a cough in his daughter puzzled him.
sentences.cn: 他女儿持续的咳嗽把他难住了。

sentences.en: By sheer persistence, I eventually got her to change her mind.
sentences.cn: 我全凭坚持不懈最终使她改变了主意。

sentences.en: He achieved success through dogged persistence.
sentences.cn: 他靠着坚持不懈取得了成功。
